name: Montote Pantachi Demo
description: Hi Everybody, this is just a demo of the game, i want everyone to know it, this is a precuel of a game that me and my friends once did with rpg maker, its a full game and free, can be downloaded from the game's page, but for the momento it's only in spanish, BUT there is a team of friends who are translating it to english so noone looses the experience of playing it, is fun and hylarious, going back to this game, this is a precuel of said game, and i'm making it all alone :P so for the moment the music was taken from nes games, i love chiptune music, so, yea, platformer, adventure, ONE stage for the moment, but eagerly wanting to finish it :P thans and if you want PLZ share it ^^
